hints.text: Help will always be given at Hogwarts to those who ask for it. Unfortunately, you're not at Hogwarts.

name: Deobfuscation - Part 2
instructions: The force is strong with this one. Use you previous answer as your starting point

hints.text: There is a way out of every box, a solution to every puzzle; it's just a matter of finding it.

name: Deobfuscation - Part 3
instructions: You know what to do. Surely you can't fail now... :D

hints.text: There is a difference between knowing the path and walking the path. Get coding!
